narrative.narrative: Nouvelair is an airline based at Monastir,Tunisia in North Africa. As of August 2014 they had 35 European destinations and one in Turkey and one in Iran and 4 in Tunisia. As of 2013 they have 11 A320's, 2 of which were being leased by Libyan Airlines. It was founded in 1989 as a part of now defunct French airline Air Liberte for charters.
